snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia and President Hu Jintao of China are expected to discuss Syria, Iran and efforts to squeeze the United States out of Central Asia, analysts said.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin arrives in China for meetings aimed at strengthening a partnership between the two countries and offsetting the influence of the United States; Putin and Chinese Pres Hu Jintao are expected to discuss Syria and Iran, among other issues.
lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia and President Hu Jintao of China are expected to discuss Syria, Iran and efforts to squeeze the United States out of Central Asia, analysts said.

headline.seo: Putin Arrives in China for Regional Talks
headline.main: Putin Arrives in China, Seeking Stronger Ties
headline.print_headline: Putin Arrives in China, Seeking Stronger Ties
